data.job_desc: As a Firefox Developer at Mozilla Corporation, I've had the privilege of contributing to the development of one of the world's most widely used web browsers.
data.job_desc_cont: My role involves collaborating with a talented team of engineers and designers to enhance Firefox's performance, security, and user experience. I'm proud to have contributed to an open-source project that empowers users to explore the web safely & efficiently.
